sources.title: Stranger on Horseback (1955) JOEL McCREA
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars Joel McCrea, Kevin McCarthy, John Carradine, and Miroslava
Director: Jacques Tourneur

In this story by King of Westerns LOUIS L'AMOUR, a circuit judge is given 12 hours to live after he attempts to bring justice to a lawless town. The last Hollywood film of tragic beauty Miroslava.

metadata.Plot: A circuit judge in the old west attempts to bring a suspected killer to justice. The judge runs afoul of the killer's rich cattle baron father in the process.
metadata.Writer: Herb Meadow, Don Martin, Louis L'Amour
